pattern.name: Correlation
pattern.description:
Calculate Pearson correlation of an attribute with time.
Note: correlation of an attribute with another attrbiute will be implemented in a separate pattern because time columns must be casted in some of the databases to a numerical columns. Hence the syntax differs.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , (Avg(@numericalColumn * @timeColumn) - Avg(@numericalColumn) * Avg(@timeColumn)) / (StdDev_Samp(@numericalColumn) * StdDev_Samp(@timeColumn)) AS "@timeColumnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , corr(@numericalColumn, extract(epoch from @timeColumn)) "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
